data.event: The Washington Times reported, on September 23, 2005, that a spokeswoman for the U.S. Department of Agriculture confirmed that the food was being held at the facility but denied any plans to incinerate the rations donated by Britain.

event.title: were inspected and approved on September 13th

data.event: He observed that 70 pallets of vegetarian MREs were inspected and approved on September 13th.
Aid workers claim that, today, BSE is much more of a problem in the U.S. than in Britain.
